code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:pt presents with 3 weeks history of Heart. he is a male aged 33 ys. he states he has never smoked a cigarette in his life drinks daily o:Height 75 in, Weight 170 lbs, Temperature 99 F, Pulse 70, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 16 a:Heart Murmur p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed metoprolol - 50 mg daily, and ordered Chest X-Ray.

s:a male embalmer aged 34 yrs presents with Heart. o:Height 75 in, Weight 169 lbs, Temperature 98.4 F, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 68, Respiration 17 a:Heart Murmur p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed metoprolol - 50 mg daily, and ordered Chest X-Ray.
